column3: 何それ？
column4: What's that?

column3: 違います
column4: Nope.

column3: やぁ！ キミ盾サーフィンしに来たのかい？
column4:
Heeey, man. You here for some
shield surfing?

column3:
木の盾だね？"盾サーフィンするには
手ごろな盾だよ それなら30ルピーでどうだい？
column4:
The wooden shield? A decent choice
for shield surfing, sure. How's about
30 rupees?

column3:
兵士の盾かい？"盾サーフィンでも戦いでも
頼りになる盾だね！"100ルピーでどうだい？
column4:
The soldier’s shield? A reliable choice
for combat or the slopes, sure.
How's about 100 rupees?

column3:
騎士の盾だね？"頑丈だから盾サーフィンには
もってこいだよ！"300ルピーでどうだい？
column4:
The knight's shield? A sturdy choice,
sure. Perfect for shredding, my man!
How's about 300 rupees?

column3:
やぁ！ また滑りに来てくれたのかな？
どんどん滑ってってね！
ていうか盾は全部売れちゃったから
もうキミに用はないんだけどね…
ボクの盾も売っちゃったし どうしようかな…？
また廃墟にでも落ちてないかなぁ…
それか ちょっと怖いけど夜
魔物が寝てるところを こっそり かすめ取るか…
column4:
Heeey, man. You back to tear it up
some more? Couldn't stay away,
could ya? Yeaaah, go nuts out there.
I'm all sold outta shields anyway, so I've got
nothin' for ya, my man.

I shouldn't have sold my own shield... Yeaaah.
Well, maybe I'll find another just lyin' around
the ruins.
Or maybe I can try sneaking up on a monster
when it's sleeping and stealing theirs...
Nah, too scary.

column3: おっ！"盾が欲しいのかい？！
column4: Heeey, man! You lookin' for a shield?!

column3: また今度 よろしくね！ていうか買ってもらわなきゃ サークル解散だよ…
column4: Aww. Maybe next time.If I don't sell somethin' soon, my gang is doomed...

column3:
ありがとう！盾サーフィンの気持ちよさ
ぜひ試してみてね！
ふぅ… これで少しは しのげるかな…
column4:
Rock solid, man! You just gotta shred it
up and you'll be sold for life!

Phew! With this sell, maybe we can keep going
just a little longer...

column3: うーん…"ルピーが足りないみたいだね
column4:
Oh, awkward... Looks like you're a little
light on rupees, my man.

column3: おや…"ポーチがいっぱいじゃないか
column4:
Whoa there... Looks like your inventory
is full, my man.

column3:
ちょっ？！
何してんの？！
column4: Heeey! Quit messin' around!

column3:
ふぅ…
あぶない あぶない…
売れる盾が無くなったら サークル解散だよ…
column4:
Phew! That was dangerous!


Ugh, if I don't have shields to sell,
my gang is doomed...

column3:
ありがとう！
これでキミも立派な盾サーファーだよ！
そういえば キミは知ってるかい？
盾サーフィン界の伝説スレミーねえさん！
スレミーねえさんが盾に乗れば
何人たりとも その前を進むことができず…
その滑りは見る者すべてを魅了したんだ！そして若くして引退し
生ける伝説となった女性なんだよ
今は北西にあるヘブラ山脈のどこかで
静かにゆっくり暮らしてるんだって
キミも盾サーファーなら 
会いに行ってみたらどうだい？
実際に行って そのまま遭難した人も
たくさん いるらしいけど…
column4:
Thanks, my man! Now you're a bona fide
shield surfer! By the way, have ya heard
about the legend? Pretty epic.
The legend of the shield-surfing world is
Selmie! When Selmie boarded a shield,
nothin' could stand in her way.
Everybody who saw her tear it up
was practically hypnotized!
That's raw skill, man.
She retired young and became a living
legend. They say she settled down in
the Hebra Mountains to the northwest.
If you're serious about shield surfing,
maybe you should try to track her down.

Actually, lots of folks have tried to meet her...
and they all ran into trouble along the way.

column3:
ありがとう！ そいつは盾サーフィンでも
なかなか壊れないからね！
そうそう壊れないといえばハイリアの盾！
業界人なら誰でも知ってる盾なんだ！
何といっても王室御用達！ その頑丈さは
盾サーフィンにも ピッタリだったっていうよ
今は ほとんど出回ってないけど…
ハイラル城には あるかもしれないって噂だよ
あそこに行って無事に済んだ人 いないらしいけどね…
column4:
Rock solid, man! That shield right there
won't easily break, that's for sure.

Oh! Speaking of not breaking, have ya
heard about the Hylian shield? Everyone
in the surfing scene covets that bad boy.
It's clearly commissioned by the royal
family or somethin'! Its sturdiness makes
it perfect for shield surfing too.
You don't really see 'em around these
days...but rumor has it there's one in
Hyrule Castle.
Though no one has ever gone there
and returned in one piece...

column3:
ここからなら まっすぐ北西の方に滑り降りたら
初心者でも気持ちよく滑れると思うよ
さぁ！ しっかり盾サーフィンを
堪能していってよ！
盾 どうしようかな…？
また廃墟にでも落ちてないかなぁ…
それか ちょっと怖いけど夜
魔物が寝てるところを こっそり かすめ取るか…
column4:
If ya slide down to the west of here,
it's a smooth ride even for beginners.

All right, let's go! Shield surf 'til ya
can't move!

Speaking of shields, I need one myself...
Maybe I'll try searching the ruins again
to see if there are any just lying around.
Or maybe I can try sneaking up on a monster
when it's sleeping and stealing theirs...
Nah, too scary.

column3:
やぁ！ また盾サーフィンしに
来てくれたんだね！
もし盾が無くても ここに少しはあるから
よかったら買っていってね！
ていうか買ってもらわないと
つぶれるんだよね このサークル…
column4:
Heeey, man. Back for some more shield
surfing? Couldn't stay away, could ya?
Heh. I feel ya.
Oh, and if ya don't have your own shield,
we've got some lying around here you
can buy, if you wanna.
If people don't start buying them soon...
this gang will go out of business.

column3:
ここからなら まっすぐ北西の方に滑り降りたら
初心者でも気持ちよく滑れると思うよ
さぁ！"遠慮せず どんどん滑ってみてよ！そしてどんどん盾を買ってよ…！
column4:
If you slide down to the west of here,
it's a smooth ride even for beginners.

All right, let's go! Don't be shy—just
shred it up.

And keep buying more shields, man!

column3:
大丈夫大丈夫！
何も心配することなんかないよ！
ボクらは盾サーフィンサークル
「盾壊し屋」のメンバーなんだ！
ボクと下にいるフィンと メンバーは2人だけだけど…盾サーフィンで さっそうと滑り降りる快感…
それを広めたくて活動しているんだ！
この丘は盾サーフィンには絶好のスポット！
さっそく体験してみてよ！
もし盾が無くても ここに少しはあるから
よかったら買っていってね！
ていうか買ってもらわないと
つぶれるんだよね このサークル…
column4:
That's all right, that's all right!
Nothing to worry about, my man!

Ya see, I'm a member of the shield-
surfing gang, the Shield Breakers!

Fin and me are the only two members, though...


I make it my business to sell folks on
the experience. The lifestyle. Yeaaah.
Shields were made to be surfed on!
Lucky for you, this hill here is the most
savage spot for shield surfing. You just
gotta crush it for yourself, my man.
Oh, and if ya don't have your own shield,
we've got some lying around here you
can buy, if you wanna.
If people don't start buying them soon...
this gang will go out of business.

column3:

強引に誘ったみたいでゴメンな
ボクらは盾サーフィンサークル

ボクとフィンと メンバーは2人だけだけど…盾サーフィンで坂をさっそうと

ていうか今月も赤字なんだよね このサークル…
column4:

Sorry about Fin strong-armin' ya

It's cuz we're members of the shield-

Fin and me are the only two members, though...


You just gotta live the experience.
The lifestyle, if you will. Yeaaah.
Shields were made to be surfed on!
Oh, and if ya don't have your own shield,
we've got some lying around here you
can buy, if you wanna.
If people don't start buying them soon...
this gang will go out of business.
